preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(rmap.concept_id) from concept_reference_map rmap join concept_reference_term rterm on rmap.concept_reference_term_id = rterm.concept_reference_term_id and rterm.code='Diagnosis Concept Set' join concept_reference_source rsource on rsource.concept_source_id = rterm.concept_source_id and rsource.name = 'org.openmrs.module.emrapi' join concept c on c.concept_id = rmap.concept_id and c.retired = FALSE and c.version is null ;

select count(rmap.concept_id) from concept_reference_map rmap join concept_reference_term rterm on rmap.concept_reference_term_id = rterm.concept_reference_term_id and rterm.code='Diagnosis Concept Set' join concept_reference_source rsource on rsource.concept_source_id = rterm.concept_source_id and rsource.name = 'org.openmrs.module.emrapi' join concept c on c.concept_id = rmap.concept_id and c.retired = FALSE and c.version = 'BAHMNI-CORE-1.0' ;

changeSet.comment: Retire non Bahmni Diagnosis concept with reference mapping code 'Diagnosis Concept Set'

changeSet.author: BAHMNI

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from scheduler_task_config where name = 'OpenElis Patient Atom Feed Failed Event Task' and schedulable_class = 'org.bahmni.module.elisatomfeedclient.api.task.OpenElisPatientFeedFailedEventsTask' and start_on_startup = 1 and started = 1;

changeSet.comment: Disable 'OpenElis Patient Atom Feed Failed Event Task' scheduler task as clinical-config doesn't have openelis module
changeSet.sql: UPDATE scheduler_task_config set start_on_startup=FALSE, started=FALSE where name = 'OpenElis Patient Atom Feed Failed Event Task' and schedulable_class = 'org.bahmni.module.elisatomfeedclient.api.task.OpenElisPatientFeedFailedEventsTask';

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from role where role = 'Reports-App';

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from patient_identifier_type where name='RCH ID' AND uniqueness_behavior='UNIQUE'

changeSet.comment: Updating RCH ID to make it NON_UNIQUE
changeSet.sql: UPDATE patient_identifier_type SET uniqueness_behavior = 'NON_UNIQUE' WHERE name = 'RCH ID';

changeSet.author: Deepti

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from patient_identifier_type where name='Nikshay ID' AND uniqueness_behavior='UNIQUE'

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from patient_identifier_type where name='RCH ID'
select count(*) from global_property where property = 'bahmni.extraPatientIdentifierTypes' and property_value LIKE CONCAT('%', (Select uuid from patient_identifier_type where name = 'RCH ID'))

changeSet.comment: Updating global property for RCH ID
changeSet.sql: update global_property set property_value=(SELECT CONCAT(IF(ISNULL(property_value),'',CONCAT(property_value,',')),uuid) from patient_identifier_type where name = 'RCH ID') where property = 'bahmni.extraPatientIdentifierTypes';

changeSet.author: Pooja

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from patient_identifier_type where name='Nikshay ID'
select count(*) from global_property where property = 'bahmni.extraPatientIdentifierTypes' and property_value LIKE CONCAT('%', (Select uuid from patient_identifier_type where name = 'Nikshay ID'))

changeSet.comment: Updating global property for Nikshay ID
changeSet.sql: update global_property set property_value=(SELECT CONCAT(IF(ISNULL(property_value),'',CONCAT(property_value,',')),uuid) from patient_identifier_type where name = 'Nikshay ID') where property = 'bahmni.extraPatientIdentifierTypes';
